schedule for Cc we have been having problems with the radiator so we are having to derate please note the modification to our usual schedule

RE badlands power plant Cc PST richard thanks for getting back to me hope all is well we will be having epmi do the scheduling as before the last notification list is shown below i will continue to use it until i hear differently from you Ring Richard Richard NRONcom AM Peter Who are you going to use as scheduling coordinator when you start scheduling If it is someone other that Enron Power Marketing Inc I think that you need only send the schedule to me however we will ultimately need to be provided with the actual production to verify the amount of production that is ultimately invoiced If Enron Power Marketing Inc will continue to be scheduling coordinator then resume the same list of people that you were previously sending the schedule to I am not sure how many of the previous list of individuals are still with Enron but if you can provide the list of individuals I can try to determine which individuals are still here and who if anyone else to sent the schedule to Richard Original Message From Peter Arellano mailto Sent Thursday January PM To Ring Richard Subject badlands power plant im back hope that all is well based on conversations with mike smith our legal cousel has advised us that our original contract with you may still be in effect until you notify us to the contrary in light of this information we have decided to resume scheduling our power could you please provide me with an updated list of people that i need to submit the schedules to including email addresses and phone numbers i would like to be able to start scheduling this coming Mondayth for production on Wednesday th please let me know if you are the right person to handle this request again thanks This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain
